topics.body:
I'm heading to bed, the part of my brain that makes me make sense is switching itself off.

Here's a parting burger.
!http://www.tastyburger.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Hardees_MemphisBBQ-Burger1.jpg!

topics.body:
"@HeroInferno":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b078c163687234ed000d5d#post_55b078c163687234ed000d5d

I had one of those a couple hours ago. It was a healthy relationship while it lasted.

Dreams of many more of those, but don't eat the pillow if you can
